title: Odell Beckham Jr shows off Bitcoin gains as ex-Rams WR's $750,000 salary soars up to $1.43M+ in latest crypto surge
description: Odell Beckham Jr.’s bold decision to take part of his NFL earnings in Bitcoin has become a financial triumph as the cryptocurrency vaults to unprecedented highs.

title: Historic House Crypto Week to Debate Landmark Stablecoin Bill
description: The U.S. House of Representatives’ “Crypto Week,” starting today, marks a historic moment for cryptocurrency with debates on a landmark stablecoin regulatory bill. This legislation aims to provide clarity, protect consumers, and foster innovation. Bitcoin’s surge past $120,000 reflects market optimism for regulatory progress.

title: Bitcoin hits new high for ‘crypto week’
description: Bitcoin continued its rapid climb and hit another all-time high Monday as U.S. lawmakers begin a week focused on passing pro-crypto legislation.

title: Record-breaking Bitcoin soars above $120k - up by more than double from a year ago
description: The latest rally came as so-called 'crypto week' got underway in the US. This refers to a series of debates taking place in Washington DC.

title: Bitcoin soars to new all-time high as US lawmakers focus on pro-crypto legislation
description: Bitcoin continued its rapid climb and hit another all-time high Monday as U.S. lawmakers begin a week focused on passing pro-crypto legislation. Data from CoinMarketCap showed bitcoin climbed above $123,000 early Monday, up from about $108,000 only a week ago. The world’s oldest and most popular cryptocurrency is currently the fifth most valuable asset class […]
